title: Them Gold Feels | Come watch and follow for Giveaway Info!
body:
Stream is up for the day
Song requests are now on! {{champion:432}} 
Follow and watch to be in the running for TWO RP giveaways
Join the SLaTerSquad

replies.body:
Oh my goodness! You're the greatest streamer I've ever seen in my life! Never have I cried and laughed at the same time in a stream before! I love you, and everything about your entire stream!


*The above was a sponsored presentation, your experience may vary. Have you heard the word of Archeage?

streaming again. 
Chilling in normals and trying to expand my jungle picks...
